doctext: police sources have reported that at least four unidentified individuals in a car today shot at a sentry post of the la tablada 3d infantry regiment and swiftly fled.    the attack took place at 0340 today.  a car was traveling very fast along constituyentes avenue.  shots were fired from it at the sentry post from a distance of some 150 meters.    according to the sources the attackers then fled.  they have not yet been identified.
